title: DEFINITELY A RICH AND SWEET PERFUME
review:
I doubted at first whether i would get a genuine one .......
since my experiance was so with snapdeal when i purchased "JPG le male" from snapdeal........were i recieved a fake one........(but they refunded me without any issues however....and thats a good thing anyway)........
But with flipkart I recieved a pakka genuine one............
INORDER TO CHECK WETHER ITS A GENUINE ONE REFER THE BOTTOM OF THE BOTTLE TO SEE A 4 DIGIT SERIAL NUMBER AND SEE WETHER IT MATCHES THAT IN THE BOX....
(but try to get from WS retails to get a genuine one.......I hope so);)
its a good casual cologne......

title: Great perfume at affordable price
review:
Till now I used perfumes like Davidoff Coolwater blue and Dunhill Red.
I bought this perfume from flikpkart without ever having smelt it and have to say it has a great fragrance.
Even from a far distance people can observe and ask for the name of the perfume.
Definitely worth using.

title: Horrible
review: I had bought tis early from shoppers stop and this one did not last as long as the one i had boight earlier

title: Not upto mark
review: Sorry to say but Boss Grey Eau De Toilette received doesnot seems to be original. I have used this product in the past which i have purchased from departmental store. My experience was fantastic & so inclined to buy the same when seen on your website. To my surprise, the fragrance is not lasting longer even for one hour whereas earlier it was quite a long lasting experience. Highly disappointed with this product.

title: Awesome fragrance
review:
Worth every penny spent!!!! A perfume with long lasting Fragrance..
Perfect delivery & Packaging from Flipkart.
